name: Vegan Mexican Wedding Cookies
description: Vegan Mexican Wedding cookies, this buttery cookie is studded with pecans, spiced with cinnamon and anise, and covered in powdered sugar
recipeIngredient: 12 oz. (1 ½ cups) Vegan butter, room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Cream butter and sugar, in an electric mixer with the paddle attachment.
recipeInstructions.name: Cream butter and sugar, in an electric mixer with the paddle attachment.

recipeInstructions.text: Add vanilla, cinnamon, and ground anise. Mix in chopped pecans.
recipeInstructions.name: Add vanilla, cinnamon, and ground anise. Mix in chopped pecans.

recipeInstructions.text: Slowly add flour, with mixer at low speed. Mix until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Slowly add flour, with mixer at low speed. Mix until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Line 2 sheet-pans with parchment paper. Roll dough into 1 inch balls.
recipeInstructions.name: Line 2 sheet-pans with parchment paper. Roll dough into 1 inch balls.

recipeInstructions.text: Place balls on sheet-tray, 1 inch apart from each other.
recipeInstructions.name: Place balls on sheet-tray, 1 inch apart from each other.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 15 minutes or until bottoms become golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 15 minutes or until bottoms become golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from oven. Place on a wire rack to cool.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove from oven. Place on a wire rack to cool.

recipeInstructions.text: Once completely cool roll cookies in powdered sugar.
recipeInstructions.name: Once completely cool roll cookies in powdered sugar.

keywords: mexican wedding cookies, vegan cookies, vegan mexican
